Ext.tab.Panel Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.tab.Panel Ext.TabPanel tabpanel tab child() hide() show() setActiveTab()
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    var tabs = Ext.create('Ext.tab.Panel', {
        width: 400,
        height: 400,
        renderTo: document.body,
        items: [{
            title: 'Home',
            html: 'Home',
            itemId: 'home'
        }, {
            title: 'Users',
            html: 'Users',
            itemId: 'users',
            hidden: true
        }, {
            title: 'Tickets',
            html: 'Tickets',
            itemId: 'tickets'
        }]
    });

    setTimeout(function () {
        tabs.child('#home').tab.hide();
        var users = tabs.child('#users');
        users.tab.show();
        tabs.setActiveTab(users);
    }, 1000);
});
